steps.title: In case of an active emergency, dial 112.
steps.copy: BIG BROTHER is not the police system. We are a bridge — built to help you stay connected, and to make sure safety systems are never overloaded or out of reach. If you are ready, feeling safe and calm, say hey, BIG BROTHER.

steps.title: Your Safety Is In Your Hands
steps.copy: Your safety is in your hands — and always trust your instincts. Stay aware of your surroundings. BIG BROTHER is your quiet companion, helping keep you safe, step by step.

steps.title: Our Promise
steps.copy: Our priority is to help keep you safe. We aren’t here to collect your personal life — we’re here to remind you that you are in control. Our purpose is to make the world safer for you, your loved ones, and everyone around us. BIG BROTHER is built on the idea of community as strength — using shared awareness and anonymous patterns to make your routes, your city, and your choices safer every day.

steps.title: Your Part of the Promise
steps.html:
By continuing, you agree to use BIG BROTHER responsibly:

  • Respect privacy — you can’t access someone else’s info; we don’t either.
  • Use for genuine safety only — false alerts divert real help.
  • Add Guardians only with consent.
  • You may delete your account data anytime; no unwanted promotions.

steps.title: Know Your Tools
steps.copy: SOS: triggers us to reach your Guardians and emergency services at once. Guardians: trusted people you choose. Blips: anonymous users visible only during emergencies. Vault: encrypted space for sensitive data. Down Time: a guided moment to steady your breath.

steps.title: You Are Never Alone
steps.copy: BIG BROTHER is your circle of trust — built by you, around you, for you. Who would you like to have your back? Add at least one guardian to continue.

steps.title: The Blips Around You
steps.copy: Blips are community markers — users who’ve opted in to be visible when someone nearby needs help. They’re anonymous and exist to reassure you.

steps.title: Access & Permissions
steps.copy: To help keep you safe, BIG BROTHER requests access to Location, Motion & Sensors, and Notifications. You remain in control of what’s shared and when.

steps.title: Walk With Me
steps.copy: Walk With Me lets a Guardian view your route while you walk home. View access is enabled only while the session is active; you end it anytime.

steps.title: The Heartbeat
steps.copy: A pulsing heart sits at the center — you. Rings show layers of safety: Guardians, blips, emergency services. One ring can display 112 as a reminder. The visual breathes calm and focus.
